#text=My family and I wanted to take a trip via train across the country .
#text=I called a travel agent to set up a time to meet with them and discuss the necessary arrangements .
#text=A few days later the appointment arrived and I went to the travel agent 's office to meet with them .
#text=After discussing our travel plans we decided that getting a private room on a sleeper car for the family would be the best option .
#text=I purchased the tickets and then went home to tell the family we were going and to pack .
#text=A week later we arrived at the train station an hour before boarding time to make sure that we did not miss the train .
#text=Once it was time we boarded the train and found our room .
#text=We stowed our luggage and discovered how the beds worked .
#text=Later it was time to eat and we went to the dining car at our scheduled time far dinner .
#text=After which we went back to our room where we did some talking before finally falling asleep .
#text=When we woke up we were only an hour from our destination .
#text=We had enough time to get changed and pack our things up and before we knew it we were getting off the train .
